clean_lid.description: Clean the kettle lid to remove dirt or any residue.

place_lid.description: Place the kettle lid back after cleaning or filling.

check_lid.description: Press the lid to confirm it's secure and well-positioned.

rotate_handle.description: Rotate the kettle handle to make sure it is secure.

pick_by_handle.description: Pick up the kettle by the handle.

place_by_handle.description: Place the kettle down by the handle.

clean_kettle_body.description: Clean the main body of the kettle to remove dirt or any residue.

pick_kettle_body.description: Pick up the main body of the kettle.

place_kettle_body.description: Place back the main body of the kettle.

inspect_kettle_body.description: Visual check of the body of the kettle.

check_kettle_body_structure.description: Gently press different parts of the kettle body to confirm the integrity and strength of the structure.

clean_whole_kettle.description: Clean the whole kettle including the lid, handle, and body.

general_inspection.description: Complete inspection of the whole kettle, including the lid, handle, and body.
